entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 03:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -37.1°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -41.1°C
Wind: S 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 36. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
